level.text: Any person required to make a report under this subchapter who willfully fails to make such a report shall be subject to a civil fine of $300.
Adjudication of any infraction of this subchapter shall be handled by the Office of Administrative Hearings pursuant to ยง 2-1831.03(b-6).

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-315 added this section.
